results.title: Gorilla
results.creator_credit: Barbara Jampel, National Geographic Society and WQED
results.brief_description: A film about the gorilla, a shy, gentle, intelligent creature threatened with extinction. Learn about gorilla behaviour and what is being done to save the gorilla.

results.title: Gorilla
results.creator_credit: Brian Leith, BBC and Discovery Channel
results.brief_description: Narrated by David Attenborough, this documentary follows three newly discovered colonies of Lowland Gorillas in the northern Congo, exploring the true nature of the great Ape. This film is a masterpiece of expertise and innovation, award-winning cameraman Gavin Thurston and his crew use revolutionary techniques, backed by some of the latest scientific research to reveal aspects of the gorilla’s lives that have never been seen before in their natural environment.

results.title: Gorgeous (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Kaz Cooke, Sharon Connolly and Film Australia
results.brief_description: Follows the perils of cartoon character Hermoine the Modern Girl as she tackles plastic surgery, beauty therapy and bulimia, in a feral fit of inadequacy. ‘Gorgeous’ asks why men and women feel insecure and what thoughts tempt them towards eating disorders and other strange eating rituals. Hermoine proves that modern girls can stop feeling inadequate and regain their self-esteem.

results.title: Gore Road
results.creator_credit: Sarah Raxlen, Robert Verrall and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: A journey of rediscovery down an old Quebec country road in the southwest corner of the province. Family pictures, snapshots, live photography, the homespun philosophy of old folks, some glimpses of the new generation - the impressions are many, varied and gathered at random to build this documentary study. Most of the film is monochrome, with a touch of color here and there to add a note of contrast.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sarah Raxlen, Robert Verrall and ONF | NFB

results.title: Goofy's freeway troubles (K)
results.creator_credit: Les Clark, Ken Peterson and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description: In this amusing driver education animation, Goofy demonstrates some common freeway problems that can be avoided by following a simple checklist which includes the car, the driver, the freeway and basic common sense.

results.title: Goods traffic for Europe
results.brief_description: Every day some 15,000 goods trains transport their freights to and from the national and international markets contributing to the supply of thousands of European towns. In addition 14,000 passenger trains travel 600,000 miles daily carrying approximately 44 million people.
